channel.title: CHICAS News
channel.description: Latest Information from the CHICAS Stats/Epi group at Lancaster

item.title: RSS Awards for CHICAS Staff
item.description: Peter Diggle and Emanuele Giorgi awarded honours by the Royal Statistical Society for 2018.

item.title: MSc Student Project Success
item.description: Olivia Pennington's MSc project work to be presented at the 2018 Society for Cardiothoracic Surgery meeting.

item.title: Disease Mapping Workshop at Lancaster
item.description: A two-day workshop for disease mapping in developing countries.

item.title: CHICAS hosting Nuffield Research Placement student.
item.description: School student to experience the University research environment and make valuable scientific contributions.

item.title: CHICAS Researcher to Mentor Google Summer School Student
item.description: Barry Rowlingson will be advising a programming project in open-source GIS integration.
